name: acid
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The foe is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The foe is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
